problem.problem_class: Non-exhaustive 'when' statements will be prohibited since 1.7
problem.description: Non exhaustive 'when' statements on Boolean will be prohibited in 1.7, add 'false' branch or 'else' branch instead

problem.problem_class: Non-exhaustive 'when' statements will be prohibited since 1.7
problem.description: Non exhaustive 'when' statements on enum will be prohibited in 1.7, add 'OFF' branch or 'else' branch instead

problem.problem_class: Non-exhaustive 'when' statements will be prohibited since 1.7
problem.description: Non exhaustive 'when' statements on sealed class/interface will be prohibited in 1.7, add 'OFF' branch or 'else' branch instead
